data.title: List of acquisitions by oracle
data.meta_description: List of acquisitions by oracle  - Download as a PDF or view online for free
data.text:
1. List of acquisitions by Oracle This is a listing of Oracle Corporation's corporate acquisitions, including acquisitions of both companies and individual products. Oracle's version[1] does not include value of the acquisition.[2] See also Category:Sun Microsystems acquisitions (Sun was acquired by Oracle). List of acquisitions by Oracle - Wikipedia https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_acquisitions_by_Oracle 1 of 12 12/10/2017 10:41 AM

2. Stellent was previously named Intranet Solutions, and its product was initially IntraDoc!. The product was then briefly renamed Xpedio! before both the company and the product were renamed Stellent in 2001. At the time of the acquisition, $440 [70] (http://www.oracle.com List of acquisitions by Oracle - Wikipedia https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_acquisitions_by_Oracle 7 of 12 12/10/2017 10:41 AM

8. Acquisition date Company Business Valuation millions USD Stellent had 575 employees.[20] Stellent was a publicly traded company (NASDAQ: STEL)[21] with trailing twelve month revenues in excess of $130 million. Stellent's primary product was known as Universal Content Management (UCM), which formed the foundation of most of its other content management products. This product and its related products were rolled into Oracle Fusion Middleware as part of the Oracle WebCenter Content product line. However, the term Stellent is still commonly used for this suite of applications. November 3, 2006 SPL WorldGroup Utility Billing and Customer Service Systems N/A [71] (http://www.oracle.com October 2006 Sunopsis ETL, Data Integration N/A [72] (http://eastbay.bizjourn October 2006 MetaSolv OSS service activation $219 [73] (http://www.oracle.com June 2006 Demantra Demand-Driven Planning Solution $41 [74] (http://www.oracle.com June 2006 Telephony@Work Leading IP-based Contact Center Solution N/A [75] (http://www.oracle.com April 2006 Net4Call Communications infrastructure and solutions N/A [76] (http://www.oracle.com April 2006 Portal Software Billing and Revenue Management solutions for the communications and media industry $220 [77] (http://www.oracle.com February 2006 HotSip Communications infrastructure solutions N/A February 2006 Sleepycat Software Open-source database software for embedded applications N/A January 2006 360Commerce Retail Industry Solutions N/A [78] (http://www.oracle.com January 2006 Siebel Systems Customer relationship management $5,850 Siebel Systems#Key dates List of acquisitions by Oracle - Wikipedia https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_acquisitions_by_Oracle 8 of 12 12/10/2017 10:41 AM
